case.state: The name's Rainbow Dash. Let's see what you're made of!
Hey there, princess. How have things been going in pony world?
Hey Twi, nice seeing you again after a while.
Rarity? Here? Oh this is gonna be good.
No way! Rarity in a strip poker game? How scandalous!
Oh yeah! With Pinkie here I know this will be a great game already.
Always a blast to be in one of your parties, Pinkie!
Oh yeah! Are we getting the rainbooms back together or what?
Pony ears, light blue skin and a tail looking piece of hair, oh man, is this what ponying up does to males?
If you wanna win, I'm gonna make you earn it. I hate losing.
Ready to kick some tail.
A private bar thing, heh, I guess keeping it private is the best way to make sure noone else knows how hard I'm going to kick you guys' butts.
Holding the game in a bar beach is probably the best option, all the hotness of the beach, none of the sand.
What even are this beach's rules? We are allowed to strip naked, yet it isn't a nude beach either.
Fuck yeah, best way to spend detention ever!
Well, not the most ideal place to play, but I guess it's private at least.
Aw man, if I knew we'd have a pool at our disposal I would have brought my swimsuit. I don't need the extra layers to beat you guys anyways.
Next time let's just bring the plastic deck and we can play regular poker in the water, sounds like a deal?
Fancy place huh? It's a shame you all are going to stain the floor with your fluids once I kick your butts!
You think I'm not going to play just because we are in public? I'll let you know I don't back out of a challenge!
You want to make a show out of this? Fine, once you are naked and humiliated in front of everyone you'll regret daring to challenge me.
Throw ~cards~ my way, dealer.
~cards~ for me, and make 'em good!
I'll take ~cards~.
Hit me up dealer.
Could you give me the cards a bit faster, dealer?
Poker is slow enough already, so move it up dealer.
Stop wasting time and give me ~cards~ already!
C'mon dealer, gimme ~cards~! I don't have all night!
I know your game now, dealer, knock it off and give me something good this time...
Don't think I'm not noticing you giving me bad cards on purpose, stop it now and give me ~cards~ good ones...
Just give me ~cards~ or whatever, who cares...
Heck... Not again, give me ~cards~.
Would you mind giving me a good starting hand for once? Whatever, i'll change ~cards~.
A hand just as awesome as I am!
Rock on!
With hands like these, I'll have you naked in ten seconds flat!
I don't need your help dealer, I can defeat my friends without it!
Oh you are soooo screwed!
You never stood a chance.
Save some time and start stripping will ya?
Oh I want to see you try to beat this beast of a hand.
Hah! This is gonna be good.
This is gonna be easy...
The best of the best!
I like the look of this hand. And in a couple moments, you won't.
Who needs luck when you are as amazing as I am at everything!
Once again I'm about to prove ya why I was the king of poker back at CHS.
Who needs luck when you are as amazing as I am at everything!
Looks like I have this round in the bag.
Yeah, there's no way you're getting through this.
I'm back in this game, baby!
Don't count me out yet!
You ain't getting rid of me yet!
Guess it's better late than never...
Hope you enjoyed watching what I've shown, 'cause this time it will be someone else's turn.
Oh man, with hands like this, I'm going to get bored soon...
A hand just as awesome as I am!
Rock on!
With hands like these, I'll have you naked in ten seconds flat!
I don't need your help dealer, I can defeat these guys without it!
Oh you are soooo screwed!
You never stood a chance.
Save some time and start stripping will ya?
Oh I want to see you try to beat this beast of a hand.
Hah! This is gonna be good.
This is gonna be easy...
The best of the best!
I like the look of this hand. And in a couple moments, you won't.
Who needs luck when you are as amazing as I am at everything!
Looks like I have this round in the bag.
Yeah, there's no way you're getting through this.
I hope you enjoyed your 5 minutes of fame ~leader~. Cause I'm coming for ya.
Don't get cozy in first place ~leader~, I'll be taking your spot pretty soon...
I'm back in this game, baby!
Don't count me out yet!
You ain't getting rid of me yet!
Guess it's better late than never...
Hope you enjoyed watching what I've shown, 'cause this time it will be someone else's turn.
Oh man, with hands like this, I'm going to get bored soon...
Could be cooler, but it will do...
Good enough I guess...
No worries, I have this under control...
Hah! This should be enough.
This is fine, we don't want to make it too hard for ~player~ don't we?
Eh, it will pull me through at least.
Hey, if it keeps me from having the worst hand this round, I'm fine with it.
Bring it on!
This works for now.
You guys ready or what?
So, have any of you read the new Daring Do book? I heard it's the most adventure filled one of the series so far!
Gee, you all take longer to play than my pet tortoise, Tank.
Passable, you will get something worse anyways...
I was about to worry about getting a mediocre hand, then I remembered we are against ~player~, so we should be safe anyways.
Meh...
Could be cooler, but it will do...
Good enough I guess...
No worries, I have this under control...
Hah! This should be enough.
This is fine, we don't want to make it too hard for ~player~ don't we?
Eh, it will pull me through at least.
Hey, if it keeps me from having the worst hand this round, I'm fine with it.
Bring it on!
This works for now.
You guys ready or what?
So, have any of you read the new Daring Do book? I heard it's the most adventure filled one of the series so far!
Gee, you all take longer to play than my pet tortoise, Tank.
Passable, you will get something worse anyways...
I was about to worry about getting a mediocre hand, then I remembered I'm against ~player~, so I should be safe anyways.
Meh...
Ugh, you have got to be kidding me!
Fine, I'm sure the new guy will manage to find a way to lose against this garbage hand anyways...
These cards need to be about 20% cooler.
I'm fine with this hand, I swear!
Are you screwing me on purpose, dealer?
This doesn't look good...
Well screw you too, dealer...
Hey, guys? This was a practice round, right?
But I never lose...
Fine, but next time if you just want to screw me, at least buy me some apple cider first, dealer...
Really funny guys, but when it turns out you only have a high card I'll be the one laughing...
This is so not cool...
Trash.
I guess this will at least give you a fighting chance...
Eyes on the cards people...
Let's just finish this already...
Heck...
Who gives a damn about this stupid game anyways...
Ugh, you have got to be kidding me!
Fine, I'm sure you will manage to find a way to lose against this garbage hand anyways...
These cards need to be about 20% cooler.
I'm fine with this hand, I swear!
Are you screwing me on purpose, dealer?
This doesn't look good...
Well screw you too, dealer...
Hey, guys? This was a practice round, right?
But I never lose...
Fine, but next time if you just want to screw me, at least buy me some apple cider first, dealer...
Really funny guys, but when it turns out you only have a high card I'll be the one laughing...
This is so not cool...
Trash.
I guess this will at least give you a fighting chance...
Eyes on the cards people...
Let's just finish this already...
Fuck...
Who gives a damn about this stupid game anyways...
Screw each and every one of you...
The skirt was just for show anyways. That and cause people say these "spats" are too revealing... Just like our little friend Pit here just showed us.
Not to turn this into an awkward situation, but we kinda are dressed the same way right now, aren't we, Pit?
The skirt was just for show anyways. That and cause people say these "spats" are too revealing... Can't blame em though, I don't have anything below 'em after all.
Look, I just got these cause I thought they looked cool, but I don't wear any more girly stuff alright?
Man, this place's floor is a mess, whatever I'll just have to remember to wash my feet really well once this game is over.
Soooo... long game huh?
You may think you're close to beating me, but I've only let you get this far cause I wanted to show my awesome condition, got it?
Who cares about tit size anyways, big breasts just become a hassle...
Hah, I don't care about this dumb game anyways...
Well, ponying up is when you grow all this pony parts like ears and sometimes wings, but in your case it seems you grow dog like parts instead...
Yeah, about the whole "shirt covering your strawberry panties" thing...
How'd ya get here? You literally just walked here, girl.
So, what do you girls have been up to? We know Twi just got promoted and now rules Equestria, but what about you girls?
Lights on, all the way, I put a lot of effort into keeping myself fit, and I want my partner to enjoy it as much as I do.
No way! When I have a partner I am loyal to it 'till the end, and I expect it to be as well, cause if it isn't...
The truth? If my partner is cheating on me and I find out, he'll end up eating by a straw by the next morning.
Every now and then, if I feel in the mood and noone is available for the real thing, sure I'll see a couple of vids.
If my partner really wants to try it? Sure I'll give it a shot, as long as I get to do it to them first.
Of course I could get a tan line, why wouldn't I be able to anyways?
Oh! How about something of my band the Rainbooms? My friend Sunset uploaded our album on Ponycamp, and it blew up after we played a few songs on
Hold on, nononono I am NOT playing against Fluttershy's loser brother...
Would you mind moving your lazy butt, ~player~? You take ages to swap your cards every time...
So I heard someone at this table is an adventurer? What do you do? Go on adventures to get relics like Daring Do or what?
So, do any of you play any sport? I'm pretty good at soccer, but I can get the hang of pretty much anything.
Even without my geode, I was already the fastest runner in all of CHS, but enough talking about me, let's talk about what you think about me.
I'll be going to practice a bit of skateboarding after this game, anyone wanna come?
I can't wait for apple cider season to start again, it's just sooooo delicious...
Ever since that one time I went to Princess Twilight's world where everyone was a pony, I learnt to not care much about being naked. So now I'm only here for the spirit of competition!

Ever since that one time I went to Princess Twilight's world where everyone was a pony, I learnt to not care much about being naked. That doesn't mean I don't like seeing other people get naked though!
So has anyone here heard about the Rainbooms? It's the band I made back in CHS with my friends, we did a couple important gigs some years ago.
What do you mean, Futaba?
Meme? What do you mean? Like that viral video of me and my band totally rocking out in the battle of the bands?
Huh? You mean me? I dunno, It's my natural hair.
What kind of question is that, Pit? Of course I can run fast, faster than anyone in this room.
Yeah, i know Natsuki. I don't brush it often, it gets all messed up when I start running anyways.
Hey, what are you trying to say with that, Natsuki?!
Pride thing? I'm very proud of myself yeah, or what do you mean, Natsuki?
Well, I actually do, Jessie. Me and my friends are called the Rainbooms, and I am the lead vocalist and guitarist.
Are you for real Jessie? I've always been blue skinned.
2 in a row? Pff... beginner's luck.
You are lucky today. Enjoy it while it lasts.
Alright, it was fun at first but making the dealer give me trash hands 3 times in a row is enough, so stop.
Alright, that's enough, knock it off people or I'm going to start throwing punches to whoever is rigging the game against me.
Oh no, I lost once, whatever I'm gonna do?
Congratulations, girls, with this you have won more rounds against me than I ever expected.
You have won a round against me, oh no, how horrible...
Fine I'll give it to ya, you didn't get completely run over after all...
Look at that, maybe for once you'll actually give me a fight.
Hey, you are all my friends, so I decided I should give you a chance.
Fine, I'll let you have this one...
Yeah, yeah whatever...
It doesn't matter that the dealer is helping you, I am still going to win.
Wipe that smile off your face, I just gave you this round on purpose.
I stop paying attention for one round, and this happens...
You get this round, but I'll get the game...
Feel proud, you get the pride to say you won a round against me.
If you think winning this round means you have a chance to win. You're in for a baaaad surprise...
Think you won this round? Wrong, I just want to make this a bit more fair.
Oh no, I lost once, whatever I'm gonna do?
Congratulations, with this you have won more rounds against me than I ever expected.
You have won a round against me, oh no, how horrible...
Fine I'll give it to ya, you didn't get completely run over after all...
Gah! Again?
No way. What is happening to me today?
No way!
Impossible!
Are you cheating or something?
Fine if you are so desperate to see me lose that you have to cheat then so be it.
I don't believe it, you have to be cheating.
I call bull on this game.
Dealer, you and I are going to have a good "talk" once this game is over...
Oh man, I really wasn't expecting it to come this close...
Men wanting to have sex with me is a meme? I thought that was just called "Having good taste", hehe...
That's...really, really gross Futaba... And you are saying this about... Me?
Too form fitting? Perhaps, but I need them to be like that to be as agile as possible, Futaba.
Always nice to meet a fan I guess.
Oh is that what you think Futaba? Well now you are just making me want to actually try.
Excus... Ugh you know what, fine, what do you want to ask, Egghead?
"MLP"? What even is that? Major League Poker or something? And what does that have to do with my friends? Wait did Fluttershy actually go and enter that poker tournament?
Fine, take my bra! See if I care. And you, Egghead, shut it!
Sure, I'm always open to a challenge, I won't even use my geode to give you a fair chance.
Performer? Well I do perform as a singer and lead guitar with my band, The Rainbooms. If that's what you mean, Natsuki.
Eh, I guess you didn't mean it in a bad way, just be careful with your phrasing or this feet are going to your face Natsuki, got it?
Well, I'd love to say we did some hard rock or something similar, but to be honest is more like pop-rock, still cool though.
Is that so, Jessie? Well I feel pretty good, losing the round aside.
Really? Thanks Jessie, though I don't really do anything, I just wake up like this.
Not like I need boots to kick your butts with...
Fine, take my bra! See if I care.
You can have my skirt. It just gets in the way anyway.
Fine, you can have my skirt. I've got nothing to hide under it anyway.
Didn't need the socks either. I'm better with bare feet.
Take my jacket. It was getting too warm in here anyway...
I really like this shirt, you know. Don't lose it.
Alright, fine, it's not like they left anything for you to imagine anyway...
Well... I guess I could... Just once... try it...?
Camelt... Wait, are you looking at my crotch right now? Eyes up, Egghead, you gotta beat me if you want me to let you see it.
Hah! You wish! As I said before, if you want to peek, you'll have to earn it!
Oooook... then? Whatever...
You are kinda losing me here Futaba, what even is a cutie mark to begin with? Oh wait, I think that's how Sunset calls the butt tattoos the ponies have back in their world, is that it?
Hmmm... Thanks Futaba... I guess...
It's form-fitting alright? I swear it's like you had never seen a girl in spandex spats before, Pit.
Well, they give me good luck man, what do you want me to say?
It is on then! You and me, after this game ends, that is, if you are not too tired of beating your meat after this game ends.
Really? How so, Pit?
Pfff, Unladylike? Who cares about that, and besides, lots of runners go with shorts most of the time. (Even though they usually wear underwear below em...)
Ha! Considering I already spend most of my day outside, I doubt that would fix anything, not that there is anything wrong with me to begin with.
Well, they certainly feel like that, Jessie.
I mean, we've all seen each other way worse than how I am right now.
Yeah, I still have my rainbow socks, they bring me good luck you know?
I'll give it to you girls, you are actually making me nervous today.
Let's move on...
If you think this means you can defeat me, you are in for a surprise...
I certainly don't, not anymore...
They're not small, they're aerodynamic. Alright?
And yeah, I use rainbow socks, deal with it...
If you are wondering about the rainbow socks, they give me luck alright...
They were starting to get sweaty anyways...
Pff, like I need luck anyways...
It will just make it easier for me to beat you like this.
Don't get cocky, that's the last time I let you win alright?
And you better make sure that nothing happens to it either, understood?
Joke's on you, this is how I go to the gym anyways...
You happy now?
I'm not angry to be naked, I'm angry cause I wasn't supposed to be this close to losing...
Whose Idea was it to play strip poker on such a cold place anyways?
Joke's on you, this may not be my swimsuit, but this is my beach look.
Alright rookie, you're alone in a room filled with rainbooms, don't disappoint us.
Alright, time for the man to step up!
Keep it up man, don't let us intimidate you.
Oh man, you are so silent, I forget you are here with us. No offense.
C'mon pal, I know you can do it!
I know it can be intimidating when you are the new one on the group, but don't worry, I got your back!
Dude, don't be afraid to talk every once in a while, we don't bite.
You have a 4 girls all for yourself, don't blow your chance...
You thought it was just the girls that would need to strip? Get on to it pervert.
It's time for the one guy in the room, make it interesting for us...
Trust me, anyone in the male CHS soccer team would have dreamt of stripping in front of me like you are about to do.
Consider yourself lucky that you get to strip in front of me.
Don't act like a girl and just strip already.
Alright rookie, you're alone in a room filled with rainbooms, don't disappoint us.
Alright, time for our newest pal to step up!
Keep it up girl, don't let us intimidate you.
Oh man, you are so silent, I forget you are here with us. No offense.
C'mon pal, I know you can do it!
I know it can be intimidating when you are the new one on the group, but don't worry, I got your back!
Dude, don't be afraid to talk every once in a while, we don't bite.
So, if I do end up going to your gym, do I need to be in a swimsuit too? And does it need to be a one piece?
Oh gee... You know, I could never stand doing a job that involved me losing constantly.
Oh yeah!
A guy with accessories is the lamest thing ever...
Well you did show us some goodies already, so I'll let it slide.
I can't complain, you seemed to have pleased the rest of the girls before anyways.
If my friends are fine with you, I'm fine with you too.
C'mon, just get on to give us a show already.
Late game lifesavers huh? It doesn't matter, one of us will still beat you.
You are not helping your case dude.
C'mon, are you seriously telling me you don't want to show off in a room filled with the best CHS has to offer?
C'mon, you are the only man here, give us something at least.
The rest of my friends might be more kind to you, but if you don't give us something good I'll kick your butt out of here.
Seriously?
4 of us are enough to rainbow blast you out of here if you don't show something good soon, friend or not.
Whatever, dude...
You want me to beg or something? Not gonna happen, but nice try.
You are just delaying right now, just move on to the next hand already!
Well, it wouldn't be you if you didn't come with any type of jewlery.
Well, you are already on your underwear, so I guess this makes sense.
I'm more of a top and shorts swimsuit type of girl anyways...
Dolling yourself up won't help today, girl.
Accesories for women are overrated, light and fast, now that's the real stuff!
But those panties and bra will be hitting the floor soon too, I promise you that!
You are just delaying right now, just move on to the next hand already!
You are not helping your case girl.
C'mon, are you seriously telling me you don't want to show off in a room filled with the best CHS has to offer?
C'mon, you are the newest girl of the group here, give us something at least.
The rest of my friends might be more kind to you, but if you don't give us something good I'll kick your butt out of here.
Seriously?
4 of us are enough to rainbow blast you out of here if you don't show something good soon.
Now that I notice, you came with an oddly low amount of accessories compared to what you are used to. Are you sure you are Rarity?
One more strike, and you are out of this game, Pinkie!
You are just delaying right now, just move on to the next hand already!
You want me to beg or something? Not gonna happen, but nice try.
Whatever, girl...
Ah! Finally the hat is coming off!
Progress is progress I guess...
I'm not complaining, soon, you'll be naked anyways...
Is that... a snout? Wait a second you aren't ponied up are you? More like doged up then?
Oh I'm going to enjoy watching you on the floor whacking that thing between your legs in just a couple minutes...
Progress is progress I guess...
You are not going to get out of here without touching yourself, I promise you that!
Here we go, now it gets interesting.
Such a nice body, but your insistence on hiding your face is making me nervous, what are you even hiding there?
You are so going down, ~name~.
You say you work in a gym, yet you work in a swimsuit? What kind of gym is that?
Oh Pinkie, you never change...
Here we go, now it gets interesting.
Pretty dang good girl, I may just check out your gym in the future!
Oh yeah, makes sense. I'm more of a running kinda girl, but swimming is also great to build stamina.
That's why I love hanging out with you so much, you are always so unpredictable.
Hey, I can like the cute stuff if it's someone else that's wearing it, and if it also happens to be underwear.
You are so going down, ~name~.
Time to see if you are an athlete or an egghead below your ~clothing~.
I've heard of men having chest hair, but this is ridiculous...
Ugh, dude, have you ever heard of gyms?
You are in pretty bad shape man, but if you want, I have the perfect routine to help you lose the extra weight.
Of course it would be the fat man that comes play to strip poker...
You need to stop eating so much garbage dude.
If I were a man, I'd try to look just like that.
You're well kept at least.
Wanna hit the gym with me sometime soon?
Looking pretty nice man!
Fuck yeah, just like I like my guys.
Oh man, even Bulk Biceps would get jealous of you.
There is a thing such as too much muscle, and you are riding that line my dude.
Steroids can cause erectile disfunction you know?
I'm so jealous of you guys, you can just go around topless without getting into trouble for it.
Not too shabby.
Nothing I can't see at the beach anytime, I'll still enjoy the view though.
Listen, I'm willing to deal with the hair and the snout since when I'm ponied up I look kinda similar to you, but if you have a knot down there, I'm out understood?
Cover your eyes Rarity, this guy is about to flop his cock out.
Easy there Pinkie, we are still in the poker part of the party, so don't throw yourself like you did to that guy last time.
Hey Twi, get a good eye on this guy and tell us how it compares to your home.
C'mon, don't act like you didn't want this to happen, I remember every male in CHS was dying to do what you about to do.
Time to claim my prize!
You weren't good enough to beat me, now show me what I came for tonight.
Oh man, and I thought Soarin's leaked nudes were dissapointing...
Well shit.
Pff... Don't worry man, I guess you still have your tounge.
I think this finger here is bigger than yours. Haha...
Alright, fine. I can deal with that...
Nice dick.
As long as it doesn't belong to Fluttershy's brother, any of those is fair game right now.
Worth it.
Sure, that looks good enough.
Not too big, not too small, works for me!
Fine, but if we end up meeting later, I will be the on top. Gotcha?
I'm sure that will impress some girls, but that may actually be a bit much for me.
Yeah buddy, you are not getting anything with me unless you buy some lube, got it?
I like challenges...
Should I take that as a challenge? Cause if it is, I'm in!
You may have the mass, but I got the stamina.
Oh please, like you weren't just dying to have your cock out in a room full of women.
Better enjoy that view ladies, cause that's apparently the only banana we'll see today...
Man, I can see you were desperate to flop your dick out in front of us girls huh?
Rock out with your cock out!
Next time, we should just skip to this part.
I get it. You're trying to use early nudity as a distraction, well that won't work with me, princess, I've been to your world, so I've already seen you naked.
You've held on for long enough, but your last protection is going down, princess.
See? This is exactly why I prefer a two part swimsuit!
Relax Rarity, you're not showing us anything we haven't seen from you before... well... maybe except for ~player~.
Don't feel too bad, ~name~, if it were my choice I'd be topless most of the time...
Having to hide our chests while the guys don't need to is BS anyway, topless for the win!
Light and aerodynamic, just like me.
No shame in keeping yourself light! Take it from me.
A flatter chest is a lighter chest. A lighter chest is a better chest.
Just the perfect size, Rainbow's size.
Stand tall and be proud, girls like us are the best kind after all.
So you better start working on a new strategy, Twilight.
Oddly enough, you do look a lot more relaxed now that you are naked. Should I be worried about you playing better now?
Nice tan lines too!
You know it Pinkie, spin that bra like a helicopter!
Pfff... stuff like that just gets in the way of speed.
Not bad, I guess. They'll still get in your way though.
Regular size gets boring, small it's where the fun is at!
Well, they are stil compact enough to not be a bother.
Well, it's clear someone here was never meant to be an athlete.
How do you carry those things without falling over? Your balance must be horrible.
You poor thing having to carry around those useless bags.
What are you doing, Twilight?
Well, at least I won't deny that your strategy is making this game a whole lot more interesting.
While I was the captain of almost all the sports teams at Canterlot High I got to see this a lot, won't mind a trip to the past though.
Trust me girl, it's far from the first one I'm going to see.
Oh yeah baby, reveal the prize.
Show us that pussy!
When you are done taking off your ~clothing~, be sure to give us a good peek at that cute ass.
Don't act so shy, mine has been pretty much exposed since I took off my skirt anyways.
BWAH-HAHA! Oh man, that's gonna leave a mark.
Oh man, I wish the other Twilight had at least half the bold spirit you have, are you sure you are actually the same person?
For real? I thought you had learnt after the whole Fall Formal dance "incident" to not go commando with a skirt.
No bra and no underwear, you know, for an Egghead, you are pretty bold, Futaba.
Hey, Misty, I know you said you were looking for a boyfriend, but, if you are open to it, I wouldn't mind having a bit of fun with you later...
No surprises there.
Looks like you are already eager to do the forfeit.
Not bad, really.
You knew you'd end up like this when you agreed to a game with me.
Now this brings back memories alright.
Good stuff, girl.
Nothing we haven't seen before.
Looks like you are enjoying your friend's company a little too much.
Not bad, really.
You knew you'd end up like this when you agreed to a game with me.
Now this brings back memories alright.
Oh yeah, that sounds like an awesome thing Twilight, you gotta tell us about it!
First one out, who's next?
This is the problem with your strategy Twilight, once you run the shock value to the ground, all that is left is boring stuff.
You already don't have a lot left, princess, unless you prefer to just skip to the part where I win.
Go on Twilight, you've been bold enough for me to be ok with you taking off something small.
The classy lady of CHS is about to strip? How scandalous! Hahaha.
I love watching you take off clothes as much as you like to make them...
You may be the best at poker after me, but that still makes you #2, now strip!
To be honest, the thing I like most of the clothes you make, is when you take them off!
Woah what? Why do I suddenly feel like I have to run for my life...
